Signal Explanations.rst: asynchronous reset of the verilog module
Signal Explanations.sig: output signal of the verilog module, which is set high after the delay condition is met

Logical Operators Explanation.s_eventually: a temporal operator indicating that the contained condition is required to occur at some future clock cycle (eventually)
Logical Operators Explanation.||: logical OR operator, meaning that if at least one of the conditions is true then the overall condition is satisfied
Logical Operators Explanation.==: equal comparison operator that verifies equality

Assertion 1.Assertion Explaination: eventually either the asynchronous reset of the verilog module is asserted or the output signal of the verilog module is equal to logical one
